Please join us on the 24 March 2026. 

Get in touch for a registration link: 

[katharine.sherratt@lshtm.ac.uk](mailto:katharine.sherratt@lshtm.ac.uk)

#### About the workshop

We encourage participation from all, and welcome a range of backgrounds and experiences. 

There is no cost to attend the event.

Lunch and refreshments will be provided.

We have some funds available to support UK travel, and support adjustments for accessibility wherever possible. 

Please email katharine.sherratt@lshtm.ac.uk for more information and support with travel or accessibility.

#### Workshop materials

We are unable to provide recordings of the workshop. 

All workshop materials will be available on this website.
